_REPLY_INFORMATION Struct Reference

List of all members.

Public Attributes

GSCDKeyRequest CDKeyRequest
 The cd key request id.

GSbool bSucceeded
 GS_TRUE is the request is a success, GS_FALSE else.

GSushort usErrorID
 The error id in case of failure (0 in case of success).

Detailed Description

This structure contains the data associated with a response to a request sent to the validation server
